meanings.sent1: The hashy smell filled the room, reminding me of the diner downtown.
meanings.sent2: The chef's special sauce had a hashy flavor that made the dish unique.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally spilled the hashy seasoning all over the kitchen counter!
meanings.sent4: The old book had a hashy cover, worn from years of use.
meanings.sent5: The hashy texture of the fabric made it rough to the touch.

meanings.sent1: The hashy brownies had a strong smell that lingered in the kitchen.
meanings.sent2: The suspicious package was found to be filled with hashy substances.
meanings.sent3: The cat seemed unusually relaxed after getting into the hashy plant.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes had a hashy glint, hinting at a mischievous secret.
meanings.sent5: The room was filled with the sweet, hashy aroma of burning incense.

meanings.definition: Covered with or consisting of hash.
meanings.sent1: The hashy plate was passed around the table, each person taking a bite.
meanings.sent2: The hashy toppings on the pizza gave it a unique and savory taste.
meanings.sent3: The hashy mess on the floor was a result of the cooking experiment gone wrong.
meanings.sent4: His hands were sticky from the hashy residue left on the table.
meanings.sent5: The hashy mixture bubbled and sizzled in the pan, releasing a mouth-watering aroma.
